import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./movieform.css"; export const MovieForm = (props) => { const [title, setTitle] = useState(""); const [releaseDate, setReleaseDate] = useState(""); const [timeDuration, setTimeDuration] = useState(""); const [gener, setGener] = useState(""); const [age, setAge] = useState(""); const [imageURL, setImageURL] = useState(""); const movieInfo = { title: title, releaseDate: releaseDate, timeDuration: timeDuration, gener: gener, age: age, URL: imageURL, }; return (

Add Movie

Title setTitle(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter movie name..." />
Release Date setReleaseDate(e.target.value)} placeholder="dd-mmm-yyyy" />
Time Duration setTimeDuration(e.target.value)} placeholder="00h 00m" />
Gener setGener(e.target.value)} placeholder="Movie gener..." />
Age boundry setAge(e.target.value)} placeholder="Age+" />
Image URL setImageURL(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter movie image url..." />
); };
